entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:50 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 3:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: SSW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain changing to a few flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 4 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of drizzle. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of drizzle or flurries in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
